sentences.en: ...stone sculptures of figures and animals.
sentences.cn: …人物及动物石雕。

sentences.en: a marble sculpture of Venus
sentences.cn: 维纳斯的大理石雕像

sentences.en: a sculpture of an elephant
sentences.cn: 一尊大象雕塑

sentences.en: A significant exhibition of contemporary sculpture will be on view at the Portland Gallery.
sentences.cn: 一场关于当代雕塑的重要展览即将在波特兰美术馆开展。

sentences.en: Exciting artistic breakthroughs have recently occurred in the fields of painting, sculpture and architecture.
sentences.cn: 绘画、雕塑和建筑领域最近出现了激动人心的艺术突破。

sentences.en: He is skilled in sculpture.
sentences.cn: 他精于雕刻.

sentences.en: His sculpture of a horse won first prize.
sentences.cn: 他雕塑的一匹马获得一等奖.

sentences.en: His tour de force is an elephant sculpture.
sentences.cn: 他的精心之作是一件大象雕塑。

sentences.en: I also like sculpture.
sentences.cn: 我还喜欢雕塑。

sentences.en: If this sculpture helps just one woman decide not to proceed with unnecessary plastic surgery on their genitals then it will have succeeded.
sentences.cn: 如果这些雕塑只是帮助一位女性决定不再继续那不必要的生殖器整形手术，那么它就成功了。

sentences.en: In spite of this, some people including myself - were surprised by a recent exhibition of modern sculpture.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 最近举办的现代雕塑展览会却使一些人——包括我在内 —— 吃了一惊.

sentences.en: In the Mus d'Orsay in Paris is a sculpture in plaster by Rodin.
sentences.cn: 巴黎的奥赛博物馆里有一件罗丹的石膏雕塑作品。

sentences.en: In the realm of sculpture too, the technical skill of foreign artists was long recognised.
sentences.cn: 在雕塑领域，外国艺术家的技艺也早已得到认可。

sentences.en: Major works of painting, sculpture, mosaic and architecture were examined in situ in Venice.
sentences.cn: 重要的绘画、雕塑、镶嵌画和建筑作品都在威尼斯原地得到了仔细检查。

sentences.en: Many pieces of sculpture are dotted around the house.
sentences.cn: 多件雕塑作品散落在房子各处。

sentences.en: Nine windows looked out over the sculpture gardens.
sentences.cn: 9扇窗户俯瞰雕塑园。

sentences.en: Painting sculpture architecture etc. are collectively called the " fine arts " or " plastic arts " .
sentences.cn: 绘画、雕塑、建筑等统称为 造型艺术.

sentences.en: Sculpture is a tangible art form.
sentences.cn: 雕刻是一种可触摸的艺术形式.

sentences.en: The plastic arts include sculpture, pottery and painting.
sentences.cn: 造型艺术包括雕塑、陶艺和绘画。

sentences.en: the techniques of sculpture in stone
sentences.cn: 石雕技艺

sentences.en: You have to create your life. You have to carve it, like a sculpture.
sentences.cn: 你要创造自己的生活。就像创作雕塑那样，一刀一笔。

words.tran_cn: 用刻纹装饰的；具刻纹的
雕刻；用雕塑装饰（sculpture的过去式）

trans.tran_en: an object made out of stone, wood, clay etc by an artist
an object made out of stone, wood, clay etc by an artist
